SEARCH
Package angryflappybird

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
angryflappybird.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
Blob, SpriteTest
public class Sprite extends Object
This class is used to create and manage sprite objects such as pipes, pigs etc in the AngryFlappyBird game.
